parameters.prompt: List all Firebase mock packages with their names, descriptions, popularity (likes/points), and last updated dates. Focus on packages for mocking Firebase Auth and Firestore.
Extract the full documentation including: usage examples, API details, how to mock sign-in/sign-up, how to mock user states, integration with other packages, and any limitations or notes.

Extract the full documentation including: package name, version, popularity metrics, usage examples, API details, how to mock Firestore operations (read/write/queries), supported features, limitations, and integration notes.
Get the changelog to see recent updates, version history, and what firebase_auth versions are supported.
Get the changelog to see recent updates, version history, and what cloud_firestore versions are supported.
List any packages for mocking Firebase App Check with their names, descriptions, and popularity.

pattern.context_summary: User researching Firebase testing libraries for Flutter, gathering documentation from pub.dev, then integrating findings into a design document with comprehensive usage examples and recommendations
pattern.interpretation: Research-to-Documentation workflow: Read existing spec, research external resources, synthesize into comprehensive documentation update with examples and recommendations
